card.title: POLITRANS LOGIST
card.subtitle: Is your reliable partner in the field of national and international goods transport services, logistics services, storage and customs formalities for import and export.

card.five: Transport services with and without refrigerators

we.title: WHO WE ARE
we.strong: POLITRANS LOGIST SRL was founded in 1995.
we.text: We are a full member of the Association of International Road Carriers of Moldova and a member of the Moldovan-American Chamber of Commerce. POLITRANS LOGIST SRL offers international road freight transport and forwarding services for any type of goods and for any destination. Our team of professionals has a vast experience in the sphere of international freight transport and provides the necessary support for such services, offering optimal solutions for your requirements. We offer national and international freight transport services, logistics services, warehousing and customs clearance services for import and export. POLITRANS LOGIST offers to its customers optimal solutions, ensuring high standards at every operational stage. We guarantee fast and efficient services for all types of freight transport and customs formalities.
